termsAndConditions.title: Welcome!
termsAndConditions.defaultAgreement: I agree to interact with the digital assistant in a respectful and courteous manner, recognizing the importance of kindness in our digital space.
termsAndConditions.defaultAgreementThankYou: Your cooperation helps us maintain a positive environment for all users. Thank you for your understanding and support!
termsAndConditions.defaultModalContent: Please take a moment to acknowledge our community guidelines.
termsAndConditions.termsModalContent: Just before we start, have a look at our terms & conditions.

webUrlInputPage.title: Welcome!

todos.neverDoneTodosBodyMessage: This is where you will find and manage your To-dos. Since it's your first time here, there is no To-do yet.

success.title: Thank you!
success.body: Your payment has been received. You can continue to use Mojodex at its full potential!

canceled.title: No worries
canceled.body: You can continue to enjoy your free access and decide to subscribe later.

error.title: OOPS! Something went wrong with your purchase.

accountDeletion.title: Delete Account
accountDeletion.body: If you wish to permanently delete your account, click the button below to send a pre-written email to Hoomano requesting account deletion.
